attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently there have been incidents which in officers of the law have been in situations where suspects have carried firearms and used them injuring or even worse killing the officers. I believe it is now time for Police officers to carry firearms in order to protect themselves and uphold the law in times of need and when faced with immediate danger. Why should our Police officers, whos policy is to protect and serve be subjected to such dangerous situations without the correct equipment to protect themselves.
